64.eng-name: Military Expeditions led by the Prophet (pbuh) (Al-Maghaazi)

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu 'Is-haq:I asked Zaid bin Al-Arqam, "In how many Ghazawat did you take part in the company of Allah's Apostle?" He replied, "Seventeen." I further asked, "How many Ghazawat did the Prophet (ﷺ) fight?" He replied, "Nineteen

chapter.ara-name: باب كَمْ غَزَا النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: How many Ghazawat the Prophet (ﷺ) fought
